column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////I remember so many interesting occasions here:  a date with a guy that I had been friends with for a while
column2: and then for some reason we decided to take it to the next step.  We came here for dinner
column3: and probably to ease the inevitable nerves
column4: we did shots of some nasty shit called "43" (I think that's they name
column5: although I was half on the floor after that!).  Can't remember too much about the rest of the evening
column6: but I know it was quite a fun night!  And times out with my best gf's . . . and did I mention how much I absolutely love their escargot with aioli sauce tapa?  It's to die for
column7: and I would seriously order it in volume if I was about to leave this earth (note to self: put it on profile!)
